website_summaries.verdict: A set of colorful squishies that's ideal for both kids who enjoy playing with them and adults who use them for stress relief – large size and perfect texture.
pros: 6 large fruit-themed squishies – approximately 4" to 7" each
Set includes a banana, pineapple, peach, lemon, strawberry, and watermelon
Squeezable yet slow-rising – traits consumers love
cons: Mixed reviews on the scent – some find it pleasant while others think it's strange

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and very good price!
customer_reviews.text: These squishies are amazing!! I love them so much. They are super slow rising and once they air out, they smell fantastic. The lemon, peach, and strawberry are very soft and squishy. The pineapple, banana, and watermelon come with key chain rings so you can attach the squishy to your key chain. The price is also great because normally these squishies are $10-$25 for each individual one in stores.
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good price and really Slow Rising!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The review would've been a five but the lemon had two defects and the paint in the front was a little off but really slow rising and squishy!! My favorite ones were the peach and strawberry. Overall I would recommend this if you are not picky with one or two little defects. Also at other stores it is $7 to $14 bucks each squishy!!! This is a great deal!👍
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very minor defects almost near perfect grade A-. Smells sweet with slight chemical but nothing over whelming. Very slow to rise. Very soft and squishy. Overall good product for the money. Only watermelon, pineapple and banana has the option to make into a charm. And they are all very big except banana and pineapple are more on medium side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great therapy tool for stress!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to use at school when she feels anxious so that she doesn't bite her fingernails. She loves these! The skin on her hands is finally healing. The watermelon, pineapple, and strawberry are best for a school setting. Parent side note: the other fruits could invite inappropriate teasing at school due to their shape - I would suggest leaving those ones at home.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be disappointed! Quality super squishy
customer_reviews.text: Good as they get!!! Very well made super soft and squeezable. Nice elasticity to the material so they do not tear. Fantastic value as the bigger ones are worth 10$ all day. They are slightly scented but still have that familiar stress ball scent. Certainly worth the buy if you want a great squishy that won’t disapoint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing purchase! They were so much bigger than we ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing purchase! They were so much bigger than we expected. Very slow rising for such a cheap price. They smell decent, but not like the actual fruit. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Very squishy but asesthetically CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed perfect until my daughter started "squishing" them! the paint started coming off from the watermelon, then from the strawberry less then 3 days of use. They definitely have a very good squishy feel but aesthetically they start looking very cheap quickly. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Physics World

customer_reviews.title: Super slow rising
customer_reviews.text: There were a bunch of defects buh they smelled ok and were super slow rising and was overall enjoying them
customer_reviews.author: anni monro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the smell but I’m assuming it’s nexessary to cover up some manufacturing smell, because I haven’t yet found squishies that aren’t scented. Left them out for a couple weeks to air out and it helped a lot. They’re not the sturdiest, but they’re nice if you won’t have a super young kid using them (otherwise it might not last-I had a student eventually rip one of mine in half). Definitely slow rising and satisfying to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly like the picture! Does not have any strange chemical smell, it doesn’t smell like fruit either. Super soft and good size for the money. If you’re hoping for a rainbow ice cream cone color you might not get it. I got the two tone blue and green color . I gave it a four star cus it doesn’t smell like fruit and the ice cream one had some kind of white color fade but nothing too obvious. See photo
customer_reviews.author: jade prak

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced crap
customer_reviews.text: My children love them. I hate them. Overpriced and I feel they are made of poison. Just another way parents are taken advantage of. The price of these rose 1000% since they became so popular. Shame on this company and any company who sells them for more than 1$
customer_reviews.author: Dee M Prisby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the squishys were amazing as so soft and squishy. AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: kerri budoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: The fruit look exactly like the fruit you see on the computer screen. Very nice bright bold colors. Very cute set. Super fun and squishy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hillius

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun squishies
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. These are slow rising, large squishies. They do have a light odor at first but it goes away fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Slow rising and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Not only do they look good, and are large in size, they smell great. I expected a chemical smell, but over all they're really pleasant. Also the squishiness factor is there! The lemon was especially slow rising. Besides a slight color defect on the top of the pineapple, everything else was perfect. For the price point and the quality I have to definitely recommend this to anyone looking for this kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great assortment and size...medium to large...no mini squishes , lemon did crack and break at the center but the kids are still playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Favorite squishies so far and have bought several different brands. My children and I, all love these squishies. They are also just fun little gifts to give to children. They feel good to squish in the palm of your hand. I’m on the autism spectrum so it does help with my anxiety as well and my fidgeting. They really are just fun to own.
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes them
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old daughter went nuts over these. She says they’re “slow rising” which is apparently important. They don’t smell like anything that I’ve noticed, shipping was fast, and arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: girlygirl

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with them. We had to air them out for a day because the initial smell was strong and unpleasant, but then they were fine
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: the lemon is my favorite it smells so good and every single squishy is ...
customer_reviews.text: the lemon is my favorite it smells so good and every single squishy is so slow rising these are my favorite squishes ever you should definitly sorry I don't know how to spell That but anyway you should definitely buy these they are so good for the price and most squishy are 20 bucks and you are getting six of them for 18 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a massive collection of squishies, and to be completely honest, these are my favorite squishies that I own. They're ridiculously soft, and extremely satisfying to hold in your hand. My only complaint is that the paint came a little chipped and ruffled on the watermelon slice one, but it's still one of my favorites from this little pack. Would absolutely recommend buying this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sciria

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them says they are super soft and light but have an odd odor.
customer_reviews.author: DY II

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! The paint chips off after repeated squeezing, however. But if you just want them as a display and don't have a need for a lot of stress squishing, they're perfect. ;)
customer_reviews.author: gypsyruth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome squishies!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve bought a lot of squishies (I don’t get it), and these were by far the best quality for the money. We’ve had for months now and they are still great.
customer_reviews.author: melbwalk

customer_reviews.title: Cute squishy toys
customer_reviews.text: My son is really into squishy toys right now, and they can be expensive to buy separately, so this is a good buy for the money. These are quite large and smell fruity. They are all very soft and squishy. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these things. The lemon is my favorite, the pineapple has good texture to it, they're all different sizes and have different feels to them so there's something for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Carson M Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Squishies!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, fresh smell and super slow reactive squishies. These were a huge hit with my daughter for her birthday and Christmas gifts. I will be purchasing again when these get torn up as you get a set of 6 for what you would pay for 2 of in a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: Best squishes ever
customer_reviews.text: the squishes came so soon only 2 days soft and slow defenatly would recamend i only wish thay where a little more slow rise.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are larger than I was expecting. These are the best! I love the smell as well. I highly recommend and will definitely buy again when needed! These are excellent for elders to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Totally LOVE it 😍
customer_reviews.text: Super squishie overall! But the pineapple was a little hard, but coming from a forth grader, I love this order!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thacher

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: They were amazing very slow rising i love these squishes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these. She has other squishies and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She has other squishies and these feel the same. She's had them for 6 months now and they haven't torn yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug7310

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing and I as a 12 year old love to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I as a 12 year old love to squeeze them when I am stressed or feeling sad😁
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and my kids enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and my kids enjoy them. They do have a "chemical odor" when removed from the packaging but once they are set out the bad smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice set. Worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice set. Worth the money for sure. I still shake my head at the obvious butt cheek effect with the peach though. Not sure what they were thinking and continue to think.
customer_reviews.author: MIC

customer_reviews.title: OMG - The Squishy Revolution
customer_reviews.text: If your kid is OBSESSED with squishies, these are for you! They are also great for stressed out kids and adults alike. Adorable fruity designs that are fun to squish - how could you go wrong?! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in three sets for my granddaughters classmates for an end of the year gift and they are awesome...
customer_reviews.author: kimberly warner

customer_reviews.title: My daughter these for her birthday in January and she ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter these for her birthday in January and she absolutely loves them. They’ve held up really well paint has not chipped or cracked .
customer_reviews.author: michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Paint  peeling off !
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned these items but I waited to open them till I was wrapping them for Christmas Big mistake ! The paint is already peeling off on some of them ☹️
customer_reviews.author: George Monington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product; came as described; my daughter and her friends love them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F

customer_reviews.title: Soft & SQUISHY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves how soft and squishy they are. The paint on some cracks rather easily. Still, she says they are really good.
customer_reviews.author: mseeger1106

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought ig for a sibling and they loved it! very soft and very relaxing to just sit and squeeze all day, nothing much to complain about it they seem veryy durable. just dont dig your nails into them
customer_reviews.author: Dagger

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but they smell terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Took a few weeks to air out before they lost that nasty smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smelly but my kid loves these. They are large and slow rising.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, not a cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: it has a strong chemical odor, but it can be aired out. Great texture, not a cheap feel
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I think that I played with these more than the kids... I just love them
customer_reviews.author: Porscha Graddick

customer_reviews.title: It's better than described. The colors are reat
customer_reviews.text: My grandchild loved it as well as myself. With Prime it arrived so quickly

customer_reviews.title: Kids love, months later still together
customer_reviews.text: Kids love, still in tact months later, nice large size.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Large enough to help your hands in occupational therapy
customer_reviews.author: Debbi N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than expected. Great product, daughter loves them. They also do not have that terrible smell I've seen with others. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but coating cracks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, cute stress toys, but the coating begins to crack pretty quickly, especially on the face of the lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Mostly very good
customer_reviews.text: All were good except the pineapple was not squishy - way too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: We loved them! There are 6 of them and they are exactly how they are supposed to be. Very slow rising and super smooth. I can't think of any problems! Worth the price and I would recommend these squishies.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Approved by daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter thought these were perfect and she is VERY picky about her squishies. She checked them over fully for "flaws" and they passed her inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them. I for the life of me ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. I for the life of me don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: PEnders

customer_reviews.title: Quality of squishies!!
customer_reviews.text: These squishies are already peeling off and the seams are splitting open. Not a happy customer. Especially after spending so much money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy lover!!

customer_reviews.title: But overall good quality! No defects at
customer_reviews.text: Many of the squishies weren’t slow rising, only the strawberry, watermelon, and peach. But overall good quality! No defects at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very squishy and they smell great. Plus, they are cute. My son is having a ball collecting these things.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne B Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: but all good when you air it out a bit
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. it has distinct smell. but all good when you air it out a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing it was pretty big and had no rips or smelled bad. I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful and are very slow rising but the pineapple looked strange. The price is not the best but the product is amazing
customer_reviews.author: JM Slimes

customer_reviews.title: Fruit squishy’s
customer_reviews.text: Peach was very Hard but it was airy but the rest was great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always leery of ordering squishies online because of actual size, quality, etc. but these were great! My daughter was in heaven and it's really a good deal for 6 larger-sized squishies.
customer_reviews.author: aoney

customer_reviews.title: There very nice just my peach was a bit hard but the ...
customer_reviews.text: There very nice just my peach was a bit hard but the banana was the softest most slow rising squishy ever the strawberry had a really big rip too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was missing one but other than that It’s Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So, somehow I was missing the watermelon. Don’t know why that happened. I’m very upset because my daughter was very excited for this but she was really sad that her watermelon didn’t come. That’s was the bad part but the rest was fantastic. She said it was really slow rising and she loved it. My one concern is why they didn’t put the watermelon squishy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: although the price was good allot of the squishes ripped easily like the watermelon had super rippy foam and the lemon got defects really easly its not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: They smell terrible and it will not go away
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these! They smell terrible and it will not go away! The kids will not even play with them. They smell like whatever chemicals are used to make the foam and it’s REALLY strong! We have bought other ones from another seller and there was no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Siciliano

customer_reviews.title: Little sister loves em!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Simple as it gets, my baby sister..9 wanted these for her birthday and she has em and loves em, she sleeps with em and all idk why but she is happy with em so I Am as well! Most importantly they are very sturdy and can endure lots of squishes
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I bought this thinking that it has a sweet smell. Oh my goodness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking that it has a sweet smell. Oh my goodness! I wished I didn't smell them. They have a stench to them that I couldn't get myself to smell them again. Quickly returning these items.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I (being a 12 yr old girl) Absolutely LOVE squishys. These were extremely pleasing and more squishy than I expected! Very happy with my perches.👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present and I think they are good quality for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but with caution
customer_reviews.text: The peach and lemon (conveniently angled) are a little suggestive for my middle school students and forget about the banana! Not my worst purchase but be warned! Also super squishy and slow rising as advertised. Not like a usual stress ball.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ITS CUTE, BUT DOESNT LAST FOR MORE THAN A WEEK OR SO

customer_reviews.title: ordor
customer_reviews.text: very cute and colorful, but my granddaughters did not like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: You were the only ones that she could find. Thanks so much for making her so happy!!😀😀
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love these squishy s so much .I guess we'll have to have some more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Petrozzi

product_meta.title: OPount 6 Pieces Slow Rising Toys Stress Relief Toys for Adults and Children
product_meta.description:
PP OPOUNT 6 pieces squeeze cream scented toys slow rising toys 

Features: 
Cream scented stress toy, also as stress relief toys for giving vent to your emotion 
In stress, anxiety and distracted, can press repeatedly to adjust the mood 
When you feel tired after working a long time with computer, you can put your hands on it to relieve fatigue 
You can make a large simulation of fruit platter 

Specifications: 
Material: Polyurethane foam (PU Foam) 
Color: Yellow lemon, yellow pineapple, pink peach, red strawberry, yellow banana, red watermelon 
Size: Lemon: 10.5cm; Watermelon: 18cm/ 7.1inch; Pineapple: 12cm/4.7inch; Peach: 10.5cm/4.1inch; Strawberry: 11cm/4.3inch; Banana: 18cm/7.1inch 

Package includes: 
1 x Lemon 
1 x Watermelon 
1 x Pineapple 
1 x Peach 
1 x Strawberry 
1 x Banana 

Notice: This is some very realistic toy, don't let your children put these slow rising toys into their mouth. It is inedible!
feature_bullets: Quantity: 1pcs lemon, 1pcs pineapple, 1pcs peach, 1pcs strawberry, 1pcs banana, 1pcs watermelon
Material: Polyurethane Foam (PU Foam), slow rising
Colors: Yellow lemon, yellow pineapple, pink peach, red strawberry, yellow banana, red watermelon
It is huge. It is as big as adult hand
It is slow rising and smells like a sweet creamy taste. Children like to squeeze it very much

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
